description: This header file declares functions and structures related to IEEE 802.11v WNM (Wireless Network Management) and RRM (Radio Resource Management) for Wi-Fi HAL. It includes function prototypes for handling WNM actions, sending beacon requests, and BSS Transition Management requests, specific to radio measurement and Wi-Fi network management.

methods.name: handle_wnm_action_frame
methods.description: Processes incoming WNM action frames for a given Wi-Fi interface and station.

methods.name: handle_rrm_action_frame
methods.description: Handles RRM-related action frames for radio measurement reporting.

methods.name: wifi_rrm_send_beacon_req
methods.description: Sends a Radio Measurement Beacon request with specific parameters to a Wi-Fi interface.

methods.name: wifi_wnm_send_bss_tm_req
methods.description: Sends a BSS Transition Management Request, typically used for indications to the client to transition to another BSS.
